com.scar.android.ServerImpl

Class DropBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scar.android.ServerImpl.DropBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    scar.IServer

    public class DropBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements scar.IServer
    Implementation of the Dropbox Server API for Android with use of the token you get via OAUTH2.
    This is a useful reference for similar APIs when it comes to authenticating, storing, retrival.
